document_data.name: Aliss Thondren
document_data.mainbody:
'''Aliss Thondren''' was a Royal Undertreasurer of [[Suzail]] who lived ''circa'' [[1148 DR]].

{{quote|''Huh, as if a [[Sembia]]n would behave any differently. We called those cabals "cabals" in my day.''|[[Vangerdahast Aeiulvana]] to [[Laspeera Inthr√©]]}}
document_data.History:
Aliss Thondren's most notable legacy was inventing the term "sneak-coins". The term became a common slang that referred to Sembian cabals, organizations, or even syndicates that were trying to wrestle control over [[Cormyr]]ean businesses and economy via bribery, blackmail, and other illicit ways of changing minds of government officials or noble houses representatives.

The term was still in use in [[Cormyr]] by the royal [[War Wizards]] as of [[1348 DR]].
